p: Authorities and officers involved in the implementation of screening measures were ministries of health, public health officers/inspectors or public health emergency staff, custom, and border control staff, airlines, airport, and port authorities, emergency medical service units at airports/ports, airline check-in agents, flight crews, airport ambulance services, physicians, nurses, quarantine officers, regional authorities and communities and fire brigade [ 6, 7, 9, 20, 21, 26].
